item.title: ESUM Urban Sensing Handbook: Component, Assembly and Operational Guide: Sensor Backpack & 360 Videos
item.description:
Responsible for the design, development, programming, and documentation of the ESUM backpack sensor module, presented in sections 2.1, 2.2, and the source code annex of the report.

Griego, Danielle, Saskia Kuliga, Martin Bielik, Matthias Standfest, Varun Kumar Ojha, Sven Schneider, Reinhard König, et al. ‘ESUM Urban Sensing Handbook: Component, Assembly and Operational Guide: Sensor Backpack & 360° Videos’. Application/pdf. ETH Zurich, 13 September 2017. https://doi.org/10.3929/ETHZ-B-000184587.
